TopicTitle: My Stuck in KSP Series Using a Green Screen

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I've been making KSP Youtube video's for quite some time now, and I've recently started a new series called "Stuck in KSP". Basically this is a scripted series where the main character gets trapped in KSP. This is all done through green screening, and I put quite a lot of time and effort into these video's. The will air every friday, so check it out if you'd like. Be sure to leave me some feedback, tips for the storyline, and of course subscribe to stay updated!

Here's episode 1:

Enjoy!

-GoldFish

first of all, usually I'm not that into live action videos but the green screen effect was extremely well done. also, have you considered putting yourself into one of the kerbal rockets or something? since we will be able to assign individual crew members to a ship in .21 you could leave open 1 seat and green screen yourself into the IVA view.
Kerbals are kinda creepy when they talk without their lips moving...
i was expecting to be longer. i was watching and was sad for it being 5 minutes long
Souldn't this be in Live at mission control? Either way great job!
